name: Galaxy Sweet Galaxy
description:
This is a game prototype developed in 2 days for the Global Game Jam 2021.

Galaxy Sweet Galaxy is a 2D single player sidescroller. Found is a planet from another galaxy, but it has been wiped away by a black hole. He managed to escape and now he's lost and looking for a new place to stay. He finds the Solar System but not all planets will be friendly and he will have to fight his way to his new home.

Credits: 

Nicolò Buganza - game designer, programmer and sound designer 

Elio Sasso - game designer and programmer 

Maurizio Lu - game designer and programmer

Virginia Braut - artist 

Ottavia Ferrari - artist

Deborah Leonardi - game designer and storyteller
